template&lt; 
    class CharT, 
    class Traits = std::char_traits&lt;CharT&gt;
&gt; class basic_iostream : 
      public basic_istream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;,
      public basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;
}}
The class template {{tt|basic_iostream}} provides support for high level input/output operations on streams. The supported operations include sequential reading or writing and formatting. This functionality is implemented over the interface provided by the {{lc|std::basic_streambuf}} class. It is accessed through {{lc|std::basic_ios}} class.
